titleStmt.title: The svvorne confederacy between the Convocation at Oxford, and the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Cheynell, Francis, 1608-1665.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, 1647. June the 5th [1647]

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Francis Cheynell; Madan gives reasons to doubt Cheynell's authorship.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "By Fran: Chenilie".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
